Description_lang: Shred deals $s2% increased damage and $?s202028[Brutal Slash][Swipe] deals $s1% increased damage against bleeding targets.

description_blz.en_US: Shred deals 20% increased damage and Swipe deals 15% increased damage against bleeding targets.
description_blz.es_MX: Triturar inflige un 20% más de daño y Flagelo inflige un 15% más de daño contra objetivos que sangran.
description_blz.pt_BR: Despedaçar causa 20% a mais de dano e Patada causa 15% a mais de dano contra alvos sangrando.
description_blz.de_DE: Wenn das Ziel blutet, ist der Schaden von 'Schreddern' um 20% erhöht und der Schaden von 'Prankenhieb' um 15%.
description_blz.en_GB: Shred deals 20% increased damage and Swipe deals 15% increased damage against bleeding targets.
description_blz.es_ES: Triturar inflige un 20% más de daño y Flagelo inflige un 15% más de daño contra los objetivos que sangran.
description_blz.fr_FR: Lambeau inflige 20% de dégâts supplémentaires, et Balayage augmente de 15% les dégâts infligés aux cibles qui saignent.
description_blz.it_IT: Aumenta i danni inflitti da Artigliata del 20% e Spazzata infliggono il 15% di danni aggiuntivi ai bersagli sanguinanti.
description_blz.ru_RU: "Полоснуть" наносит на 20% больше урона. "Размах" наносит на 15% больше урона целям, истекающим кровью.
description_blz.ko_KR: 출혈 중인 대상에 대한 칼날 발톱의 공격력이 20%만큼, 휘둘러치기의 공격력이 15%만큼 증가합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 撕碎造成的傷害提高20%，揮擊對流血的目標額外造成15%傷害。
description_blz.zh_CN: 撕碎造成的伤害提高20%，此外，横扫对流血的目标造成的伤害提高15%。
